verbs.description: While Trump [V: has] been feuding with Canadian leaders over tariffs and Mexico about his proposed border wall , the political leaders are not heavily involved in the World Cup bid .
While Trump has [V: been] feuding with Canadian leaders over tariffs and Mexico about his proposed border wall , the political leaders are not heavily involved in the World Cup bid .
